author: rooneg
msg: Improve clarity of the copy baton's members in ra_dav's commit code.
(copy_baton): Replace method with a boolean making_a_copy, since
we only used the method in the case of a copy, and there's no
reason to store a string if all that's needed is a boolean.  Also,
update comments to indicate which variables can be NULL and when.

author: maxb
msg: * tools/examples/svnshell.py (do_cat): Fix endless loop cat-ing files larger
than SVN_STREAM_CHUNK_SIZE, and the addition of spurious newlines.

author: luebbe
msg: merged changes in r17987 from trunk
corrected some more typos and inconsistencies that weren't merged before

author: luebbe
msg: Fix several typos found by Tobias Schäfer and some more :-)
